member.name: T:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.CharacterInput
member.summary: Represents a set of filter properties for character search

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.CharacterInput.Name
member.summary: Return only characters matching the specified full character name (e.g. Spider-Man).

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.CharacterInput.NameStartsWith
member.summary: Return characters with names that begin with the specified string (e.g. Sp).

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.CharacterInput.ModifiedSince
member.summary: Return only characters which have been modified since the specified date.

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.CharacterInput.Comics
member.summary: Return only characters which appear in the specified comics (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.CharacterInput.Series
member.summary: Return only characters which appear the specified series (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.CharacterInput.Events
member.summary: Return only characters which appear in the specified events (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.CharacterInput.Stories
member.summary: Return only characters which appear the specified stories (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.CharacterInput.OrderBy
member.summary: Order the result set by a field or fields. Add a "-" to the value sort in descending order. Multiple values are given priority in the order in which they are passed.

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.CharacterInput.Limit
member.summary: Limit the result set to the specified number of resources.

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.CharacterInput.Offset
member.summary: Skip the specified number of resources in the result set.

member.name: T:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.ComicInput
member.summary: Represents a set of filter properties for comic search

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.ComicInput.Format
member.summary: Filter by the issue format (e.g. comic, digital comic, hardcover).

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.ComicInput.FormatType
member.summary: Filter by the issue format type (comic or collection).

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.ComicInput.NoVariants
member.summary: Exclude variant comics from the result set.

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.ComicInput.dateDescriptior
member.summary: Return comics within a predefined date range.

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.ComicInput.DateRange
member.summary: Return comics within a predefined date range. Dates must be specified as date1,date2 (e.g. 2013-01-01,2013-01-02). Dates are preferably formatted as YYYY-MM-DD but may be sent as any common date format.

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.ComicInput.Title
member.summary: Return only issues in series whose title matches the input.

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.ComicInput.TitleStartsWith
member.summary: Return only issues in series whose title starts with the input.

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.ComicInput.StartYear
member.summary: Return only issues in series whose start year matches the input.

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.ComicInput.IssueNumber
member.summary: Return only issues in series whose issue number matches the input.

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.ComicInput.DiamondCode
member.summary: Filter by diamond code.

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.ComicInput.DigitalId
member.summary: Filter by digital comic id.

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.ComicInput.Upc
member.summary: Filter by UPC.

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.ComicInput.Isbn
member.summary: Filter by ISBN.

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.ComicInput.Ean
member.summary: Filter by EAN.

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.ComicInput.Issn
member.summary: Filter by ISSN.

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.ComicInput.HasDigitalIssue
member.summary: Include only results which are available digitally.

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.ComicInput.ModifiedSince
member.summary: Return only comics which have been modified since the specified date.

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.ComicInput.Creators
member.summary: Return only comics which appear in the specified creators (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.ComicInput.Series
member.summary: Return only comics which appear the specified series (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.ComicInput.Events
member.summary: Return only comics which appear in the specified events (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.ComicInput.Stories
member.summary: Return only comics which appear in the specified stories (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.ComicInput.SharedAppearances
member.summary: Return only comics in which the specified characters appear together (for example in which BOTH Spider-Man and Wolverine appear).

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.ComicInput.Collaborators
member.summary: Return only comics in which the specified creators worked together (for example in which BOTH Stan Lee and Jack Kirby did work).

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.ComicInput.OrderBy
member.summary: Order the result set by a field or fields. Add a "-" to the value sort in descending order. Multiple values are given priority in the order in which they are passed.

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.ComicInput.Limit
member.summary: Limit the result set to the specified number of resources.

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.ComicInput.Offset
member.summary: Skip the specified number of resources in the result set.

member.name: T:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.EventInput
member.summary: Represents a set of filter properties for event search

member.summary: Filter the event list by name.

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.EventInput.NameStartsWith
member.summary: Return events with names that begin with the specified string (e.g. Sp).

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.EventInput.ModifiedSince
member.summary: Return only events which have been modified since the specified date.

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.EventInput.Creators
member.summary: Return only events which feature work by the specified creators (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.EventInput.Series
member.summary: Return only characters which appear the specified series (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.EventInput.Comics
member.summary: Return only events which appear in the specified comics (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.EventInput.Stories
member.summary: Return only events which appear the specified stories (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.EventInput.OrderBy
member.summary: Order the result set by a field or fields. Add a "-" to the value sort in descending order. Multiple values are given priority in the order in which they are passed.

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.EventInput.Limit
member.summary: Limit the result set to the specified number of resources.

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.EventInput.Offset
member.summary: Skip the specified number of resources in the result set.

member.name: T:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.SerieInput
member.summary: Represents a set of filter properties for event search

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.SerieInput.Title
member.summary: Filter by series title.

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.SerieInput.TitleStartsWith
member.summary: Return series with titles that begin with the specified string (e.g. Sp).

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.SerieInput.StartYear
member.summary: Return only series matching the specified start year.

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.SerieInput.ModifiedSince
member.summary: Return only series which have been modified since the specified date.

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.SerieInput.Comics
member.summary: Return only series which contain the specified comics (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.SerieInput.Stories
member.summary: Return only series which contain the specified stories (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.SerieInput.Events
member.summary: Return only series which have comics that take place during the specified events (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.SerieInput.Creators
member.summary: Return only series which feature work by the specified creators (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.SerieInput.SeriesType
member.summary: Filter the series by publication frequency type.

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.SerieInput.Contains
member.summary: Return only series containing one or more comics with the specified format.

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.SerieInput.OrderBy
member.summary: Order the result set by a field or fields. Add a "-" to the value sort in descending order. Multiple values are given priority in the order in which they are passed.

member.summary: Limit the result set to the specified number of resources.

member.name: P:Dextra.Marvel.Application.Models.Input.SerieInput.Offset
member.summary: Skip the specified number of resources in the result set.
